task.title: How to Multiply Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here are instructions for using the multiplication feature of the JPS Calculator app.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully multiply numbers, you must be familiar with the arithmetic process of multiplication.
taskbody.result: The result of the multiplication is displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to multiply 2 by 3. The equation looks like this: 2 X 3 = 6. You enter 2, press the times button, enter 3, and press the equals button. The result 6 appears on the screen.
